annotations.description: A Bright and herbaceous swizzle variant from legendary barman Sam Ross. This episode is all talk, talk, talk so to skip ahead to the recipe here's a time sta...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Freight Train Swizzle

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Appleton 12yr Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Velvet Falernum
.75oz (22.5ml) Green Chartreuse
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
Top Angostura Bitters
Mint Sprig Garnish

Dry shake and pour over crushed ice. 
Top with Angostura

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cSPKyfVh3T4
title: Freight Train Swizzle
